CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 24, 1957, pg. A12, reads: "Center Of Attention at the Saturday supper and musicale given by Dr. James Hopson, Talladegha College professor, was young Larry Carroll, far right, of Chicago, son of Atty. and Mrs. Lawrence Carroll. Holding him is Mrs. Loften Mitchell, of New York, while Mrs. Leon McCray, Dr. Hopson's sister, looks on.  Standing are Edith Taylor of Washington, Pa., and Eric Graham of Chicago. - Teenie Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait, from left, front row: Mrs. Leon McCray, Mrs. Loften Mitchell, and Larry Carroll; standing: Eric Graham and Edith Taylor, gathered for cocktail party in home of Nathaniel and Helen Dandridge
